txt.en: 'I do not wish to entertain the possibility of treachery from one of our own tribes, but in these times, who can say?'
'Ever do we watch the Forodwaith pass. If our enemies try to move there, we will know it.'
'The Susi-väki are honourless savages, but that only makes them a greater threat.'
'There is another meeting of our houses today to discuss the current threats the Lumi-väki face.'
